detection.comment: confidence_threshold: minimum confidence for object detection (0.0-1.0). closeup_threshold: maximum bbox coverage to avoid closeups (0.0-1.0)

outliers.comment: iqr_multiplier: standard is 1.5 for IQR outlier detection. Lower = more strict (more outliers removed), Higher = more lenient. method: 'iqr' or 'zscore'

search.comment: positive_keywords: terms added to improve search quality. negative_keywords: terms to exclude from results

image_processing.comment: max_resolution: maximum dimension for image processing (px). batch_size: images processed per batch. thumbnail_size_kb: max thumbnail file size

api.comment: images_per_search_default: default number of images to fetch. images_dropdown_options: available options in dropdown
